text: Liu Zhixuan (), born January 7, 1991) is a Chinese professional basketball player who plays for the Liaoning Flying Leopards of the Chinese Basketball Association.Zhi Xuan Liu, RealGM.com, accessed 07 January 2017. He represented China's national basketball team at the 2016 FIBA Asia Challenge in Tehran, Iran, where he recorded most assists for his team and was also the best 3 point and free throw shooter.FIBA Asia Challenge 2016, FIBA.com, accessed 27 December 2016. ==References== ==External links== *FIBA Profile *Asia- basket.com Profile Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Basketball players from Liaoning Category:Liaoning Flying Leopards players Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Chinese men's basketball players Category:Basketball players at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for China Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in basketball
title: Liu Zhixuan
